extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite      GEOL319 or permission of the Dept.

basic.description: This 12-day, intensive field course focuses on field and laboratory techniques using a wide array of geophysical site investigation and exploration methods. Review lectures on instrument theory and principles of exploration program design. The course culminates in an exercise to design and implement an integrated geophysical site investigation.
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Geophysics Field School
